attributes.action: Force the BBC to maintain Scotlands daily covid19 broadcasts on BBC scotland
attributes.additional_details: It's a blatent disregard for those indaviduals who rely on the daily broadcast for their information.
attributes.background: Force the  BBC to continue Scottish government covid 19 daily updates for the sake of the nation of people who depend on this to keep updated on the situation in Scotland.

rejection.details:
The BBC is operationally independent, so decisions about content are a matter for the BBC, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published, the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

We call upon the government to reinstate the Covid19 Daily Briefings: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329874

Pass a law requiring the daily No 10 press briefing be streamed/broadcast live: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315870
